activities:
Marketing Advocate uses this information in several ways:
• To provide relevant, personalized, targeted news and information both on our site and via email 
• To help target advertising messages included in our email newsletters so that we are able to continue to provide our service to users at no cost 
• To enable our customer service professionals to respond to feedback
• On rare occasions it is necessary to send out a strictly service-related, non-promotional announcement. For instance, if our platform is temporarily suspended for maintenance we might send users an email. Generally, users may not opt-out of these communications, though they can deactivate their account.
